mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(Singin_Member_date, '%Y%m%d') AS date, count(*) AS cnt FROM Member_Table where m_role = '1' and m_access = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(Singin_Member_date, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY date
select DATE_FORMAT(c_date, '%Y%m%d') AS date2, count(*) AS commentcnt from Comment_Table where c_kind = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(c_date, '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY date2
